name: Bank not obligated to pay check more than six months old
text: §490:4-404  Bank not obligated to pay check more than six months old.  A bank is under no obligation to a customer having a checking account to pay a check, other than a certified check, which is presented more than six months after its date, but it may charge its customer's account for a payment made thereafter in good faith. [L 1965, c 208, §4-404; HRS §490:4-404; ree L 1991, c 118, pt of §4]
